tool_description: Medical claims processing API (Beta) developed using Rules Magic. This API is designed to streamline the development of medical claims processing systems. Currently, the API supports edits similar to CMS edits provided by IOCE software but in a more comprehensive and flexible way.
name: Rules Magic
title: Rules Magic

api_list.name: Medical Claims
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to process medical claims.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rules-magic.p.rapidapi.com/medical-claim"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rules-magic.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rules-magic.p.rapidapi.com/medical-claim"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rules-magic.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
